net.viktorc.detroid.framework.gui.dialogs

Class PromotionDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.control.Dialog<Piece>
      • net.viktorc.detroid.framework.gui.dialogs.PromotionDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class PromotionDialog
extends javafx.scene.control.Dialog<Piece>
    A dialog for handling chess promotions by presenting a set of selectable pieces to promote to. The selected piece is returned by the showAndWait method.
    Author:
    Viktor
